languages.text: "Был найден обескровленный и изуродованный труп рабочего. Личность и должность пока не установлены, но хирургеон показал, что среди всей крови, пущенной в купальню, кровь с мутациями принадлежала именно ему".

"We have discovered a worker's corpse, mutilated and desiccated. We are still looking into the man's identity and position, but the chirurgeon's report has confirmed that, among all the blood that was pumped into your bathchamber, the blood carrying mutations was indeed his."
languages.original_text: "Был найден обескровленный и изуродованный труп рабочего. Личность и должность пока не установлены, но хирургеон показал, что среди всей крови, пущенной в купальню, кровь с мутациями принадлежала именно ему".

traits.locale_text: "We have discovered a worker's corpse, mutilated and desiccated. We are still looking into the man's identity and position, but the chirurgeon's report has confirmed that, among all the blood that was pumped into your bathchamber, the blood carrying mutations was indeed his."

"We have discovered a worker's corpse, mutilated and desiccated. We are still looking into the man's identity and position, but the chirurgeon's report has confirmed that, among all the gore that was pumped into your bathchamber, the blood carrying mutations was indeed his."

"We have discovered a worker's corpse, mutilated and desiccated. We are still looking into the man's identity and position, but the chirurgeon's report has confirmed that, among all the blood that was pumped into your bathchamber, the blood carrying mutations was indeed his."

languages.text: « Nous avons retrouvé le corps d'un ouvrier, sauvagement mutilé et exsangue. Nous n'avons pas encore réussi à l'identifier, mais le rapport du chirurgeon confirme que le sang mutant déversé dans votre cabine de bain avec le reste était bien le sien. »
languages.original_text: "We have discovered a worker's corpse, mutilated and desiccated. We are still looking into the man's identity and position, but the chirurgeon's report has confirmed that, among all the blood that was pumped into your bathchamber, the blood carrying mutations was indeed his."

traits.locale_text: « Nous avons retrouvé le corps d'un ouvrier, sauvagement mutilé et exsangue. Nous n'avons pas encore réussi à l'identifier, mais le rapport du chirurgeon confirme que le sang mutant déversé dans votre cabine de bain avec le reste était bien le sien. »

languages.text: «Hemos descubierto el cadáver de un trabajador mutilado y disecado. Aún estamos investigando la identidad y el puesto del hombre, pero el informe del cirujano ha confirmado que, de toda la sangre que se vertió en su cámara de baño, la que presentaba mutaciones era suya».
languages.original_text: "We have discovered a worker's corpse, mutilated and desiccated. We are still looking into the man's identity and position, but the chirurgeon's report has confirmed that, among all the blood that was pumped into your bathchamber, the blood carrying mutations was indeed his."

traits.locale_text: «Hemos descubierto el cadáver de un trabajador mutilado y disecado. Aún estamos investigando la identidad y el puesto del hombre, pero el informe del cirujano ha confirmado que, de toda la sangre que se vertió en su cámara de baño, la que presentaba mutaciones era suya».

languages.text: “我们发现了一具工人的尸体，尸体残缺不全，血都被放干了。目前，我们仍然在调查这名男子的身份与生前的岗位，但船医的报告已经证实，在注入您浴室的所有血液中，携带变异基因的血液确实来自这个人。”
languages.original_text: "We have discovered a worker's corpse, mutilated and desiccated. We are still looking into the man's identity and position, but the chirurgeon's report has confirmed that, among all the blood that was pumped into your bathchamber, the blood carrying mutations was indeed his."

traits.locale_text: “我们发现了一具工人的尸体，尸体残缺不全，血都被放干了。目前，我们仍然在调查这名男子的身份与生前的岗位，但船医的报告已经证实，在注入您浴室的所有血液中，携带变异基因的血液确实来自这个人。”

languages.text: 「切り刻まれ、干からびた労働者の遺体を発見しました。遺体の身元と地位はまだ調査中ですが、チラージョンの報告書によると、陛下の浴室に送り込まれた血液のうち、変異を起こしていたものは、たしかにその男のものだそうです」
languages.original_text: "We have discovered a worker's corpse, mutilated and desiccated. We are still looking into the man's identity and position, but the chirurgeon's report has confirmed that, among all the blood that was pumped into your bathchamber, the blood carrying mutations was indeed his."

traits.locale_text: 「切り刻まれ、干からびた労働者の遺体を発見しました。遺体の身元と地位はまだ調査中ですが、チラージョンの報告書によると、陛下の浴室に送り込まれた血液のうち、変異を起こしていたものは、たしかにその男のものだそうです」

languages.text: "Wir haben die Leiche eines Arbeiters entdeckt, verstümmelt und vertrocknet. Wir prüfen noch, wer der Mann war und welchen Posten er bekleidet hat, doch der Bericht des Chirurgeums hat bestätigt, dass das mutierte Blut, das in Euer Bad gepumpt wurde, tatsächlich von ihm stammte."
languages.original_text: "We have discovered a worker's corpse, mutilated and desiccated. We are still looking into the man's identity and position, but the chirurgeon's report has confirmed that, among all the blood that was pumped into your bathchamber, the blood carrying mutations was indeed his."

traits.locale_text: "Wir haben die Leiche eines Arbeiters entdeckt, verstümmelt und vertrocknet. Wir prüfen noch, wer der Mann war und welchen Posten er bekleidet hat, doch der Bericht des Chirurgeums hat bestätigt, dass das mutierte Blut, das in Euer Bad gepumpt wurde, tatsächlich von ihm stammte."

languages.text: "Bir işçinin cesedini bulduk. Her tarafı yara bere içinde ve damarlarında kan namına bir şey kalmamış. Hâlâ adamın kimliği ile mevkisini öğrenmeye çalışıyoruz. Ancak cerrahın raporu, hamamınıza pompalanan kanın içine karışan mutasyon taşıyan kanın bu cesede ait olduğunu doğruluyor."
languages.original_text: "We have discovered a worker's corpse, mutilated and desiccated. We are still looking into the man's identity and position, but the chirurgeon's report has confirmed that, among all the blood that was pumped into your bathchamber, the blood carrying mutations was indeed his."
